title: Advanced Enterprise Wide Business Processes for Accounting
description: Study of various transactions in order to understand the underlying business processes and information flows between various business units, in order for a transaction to occur and be properly reported, and the information determined that is critical for the information system to capture. Emphasis of role of information systems in controlling the authorization of transactions, access to information, access to assets, preparation of accounting records and reports. 3 seminars, 1 activity.
prerequisites: OCOB graduate standing or approval from the Associate Dean
